item.title: Lots of fly tipping again being left, 13th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peckham, London

item.title: I wish to raise concerns about transport for London red buses. This is the second fatal collision involving a London red bus. A double deck bus has mounted the foot path drove into the bus stop,brick wall knocking it completely over this poses a hazard and loss of life to members of public and pedestrians. Sooner or later a member of public are going to be fatally injured and killed. Regular occurrence. This is similar to Victoria station bus collisions no one listens into many people die., 13th November
item.description:

item.title: Repeated Dog Fouling, 13th November
item.description:
There is someone who walks their dog early between 4am to 6am and they do not pick up their dog's mess. The dog fouling is always on the Grass verge outside no: 40 Frinsted Road. My neighbour has tried to catch them on the ring bell but have not managed to do so yet. I will be reporting this matter to my MP as something needs to be done about that grass verge. It does not serve a purpose.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frinsted Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
